scripts.generate: export RESUME_THEME=jsonresume-theme-eloquent && npm run generate:pdf && npm run generate:html
scripts.generate:jp: export RESUME_THEME=jsonresume-theme-eloquent && cd jp && resume export jp.html --theme $RESUME_THEME && resume export jp.pdf --theme $RESUME_THEME && mv jp.html ../jp.html && mv jp.pdf ../jp.pdf
